seniority_level.evidence: 5-7 years of experience required, which aligns with senior level in data engineering roles

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Data Engineer' and responsibilities focus on data gathering, storage, and processing

sub_specialty.evidence: Mentions batch processing and BPM workflow automation, no explicit streaming tools like Kafka or Flink

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of managing teams or mentoring; focus is on individual technical contributions and collaboration

primary_cloud.evidence: No cloud providers (AWS, Azure, GCP) mentioned in job description or Pass 1 extraction

secondary_clouds.evidence: No cloud platforms mentioned at all

processing_paradigm.evidence: Mentions both batch and real-time processing explicitly

orchestrator_category.evidence: No orchestrators like Airflow, Dagster, or cloud-native tools mentioned

storage_layer.evidence: No specific storage systems like Snowflake, S3, or Delta Lake mentioned

remote_restriction.evidence: Location specified as Bengaluru East, Karnataka, India — implies regional restriction

timezone_focus.evidence: Location restricted to India, implying India-specific timezone focus

relocation_required.evidence: No mention of relocation; location is fixed to Bengaluru, suggesting local hire

h1b_friendly.evidence: No visa sponsorship mentioned; location is India, not US

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No mention of student visas; role requires 5+ years experience, incompatible with OPT/CPT

citizenship_required.evidence: Location in India implies local work authorization required, no citizenship restriction stated

w2_vs_1099.evidence: IBM is a large corporation; role described as full-time position implies W2 employment

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits listed in Pass 1 extraction or job description

growth_path_clarity.evidence: Mentions 'accelerate impact' and 'meaningful change' but no specific career tracks or progression paths

mentorship_signals.evidence: Mentions collaboration with diverse teams and stakeholders, implying learning from others

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No mention of promotions, advancement, or career ladder

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers or role changes

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career tracks (IC, management, etc.) mentioned in job description or Pass 1

requirement_strictness.evidence: All skills listed as 'must have' with no 'nice to have' items; 5-7 years experience required

scope_definition.evidence: Focused on BPM application development, data engineering, and process automation — well-defined scope

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: 5-7 years experience aligns with senior level; skills are specific to BPM and databases, not overly broad
